name: Bridge Defense
description:
The game is a lane defender with 4 stages. It's a very simple design, and doesn't bring anything new to the concept, but it's a nice distraction and my largest project to date.

To play, click the desired unit's icon on the bottom of the screen, and then click again to place the unit on the map. Hover of the units' icons for a brief description.

Project created from www.gamedev.tv's 2D Platformer course. I expanded the Lane Defender design to include my own assets, effects, music, functionality and corrected some bugs that lingered in the course's design.

Music by Greisinger

Sound Effects from 3rd Note Studio (From Unity Asset Store)
Character Sprites from Game Character Hub: Portfolio Edition
Barrier and Background from Dungeon Painter Studio
